modules.name: Button - Trigger/CV Utility
modules.description: Multi-tool with probability, scaled random cv gen, a<>b switch, constant voltage, 0.2s-10s gate & trig out + text label. Slew&retrig menu options.

modules.name: BPM Clock
modules.description: Lightweight BPM clock with run & reset. Master + 3 (/32 to x32) mult/div clock outputs. Meant for single row patches

modules.name: Knobs - Const Voltage Source Sequencer
modules.description: 8CH Volt Bank with built-in sequencer. Probability, Playmodes, CH/Step number and knob range setting. Clk, Rst, Button in. Sequenced CV + Trig and static Poly out.

modules.name: Gate Length Sequencer
modules.description: Sequences 6 Gates (0.1s-10s) with playmodes, probability, seq length, reset. For holding notes, envelopes and switches.

modules.name: Poly to Sequence
modules.description: Takes a polyphonic Input and sequences it to a clock (fwd, bwd, rnd). Step probability + add random probability with range.

modules.name: Volt Meter
modules.description: Polyphonic Volt Meter. Inputs are merged to output.

modules.name: Note Display
modules.description: Displays the notes (& cents) of a polyphonic input. With quantization option (to semis) for the output. Displays: Note, Octave, Cent (ie: G#4 + 26)

modules.name: Sample & Hold
modules.description: S&H with min, max, channels and probability. #2s settings apply to #3. Probability applies seperately to each poly channel

modules.name: Poly Comparator
modules.description: Compares all channels from a polyphonic input with set threshold. Outputs Poly a<>b Gates and CV/Audio.

modules.name: Polyphonic Merge
modules.description: 16 mono inputs can be merged into a polyphonic output.

modules.name: Polyphonic Split
modules.description: Splits a polyphonic input into monophonic outputs.
